brainly_data.question:
When a driver touches a car's steering wheel on a hot day, heat is transferred to the driver's hands by _______

A: Conduction

B: Convection

C: Electromagnetism

D: Radiation
brainly_data.subject: Physics

all_answers.text: Conduction boi :) And YES I'm right

all_answers.text:

Conduction is the transfer of energy through the touching of two objects
